Lexer_val_types


Defines

#define MAX_BIT_WIDTH   1024
#define DECIMAL   0
#define BINARY   1
#define OCTAL   2
#define HEXIDECIMAL   3

Detailed Description

The following defines specify what type of vector value can be extracted from a value string. These defines are used by vector.c and the lexer.

Define Documentation

#define BINARY   1
 

String in format [bB][01xXzZ_\?]+

#define DECIMAL   0
 

String in format [dD][0-9]+

#define HEXIDECIMAL   3
 

String in format [hH][0-9a-fA-FxXzZ_\?]+

#define MAX_BIT_WIDTH   1024
 

Maximum number of bits that a vector can hold

#define OCTAL   2
 

String in format [oO][0-7xXzZ_\?]+
